heading: Objective
body: Guide the guest through a test drive that connects features to feelings, reduces uncertainty, and builds confident ownership vision—without pressure.

heading: Core Idea
body: The test drive is not a feature tour—it is a confidence event. Our job is to create safety, meaning, and confidence.
notes: Use as opening block under objective.

heading: Flow
body: Use a repeatable Emotional Test Drive flow: Setup → Experience → Confirm.
notes: Add as a visual workflow in the app.

heading: 2.0 The Science
body: Guests use the test drive to reduce fear of regret, uncertainty, and trust concerns. Emotional connection lowers threat and speeds confident decisions.

heading: Psychological Safety
body: Safety comes from clear expectations, calm pace, permission-based language, and giving the guest control.

heading: Future Pacing
body: Ownership vision increases confidence. Use specific life scenes so benefits feel real.
bullets: Winter commute|School drop-off|Highway merge|Parking at work|Weekend road trip

heading: Feature → Benefit Translation
body: Specs overwhelm. Benefits help guests decide. Use Need → Feature → Feeling → Moment.

heading: Micro-Confirmations
body: People don’t object when confused—they go quiet. Check alignment every 60–90 seconds.
bullets: How does that feel?|Is that what you expected?|Does that solve it?

heading: Peak-End Rule
body: Guests remember the strongest moment and the ending. Plan one peak moment and end with calm clarity.

heading: Pre-Drive Setup
body: Before moving, confirm top 2 priorities, explain route/time, comfort check, and choose a focus moment.

heading: Only What Matters
body: No feature dumping. Tie features only to stated needs and real life moments.
bullets: No dumping|Tie to needs|Tie to moments

heading: Permission-Based Prompts
body: Use permission language before pointing features out or prompting a peak moment.
bullets: Would it help if…|Can I point out…|Do you want to feel…

heading: Post-Drive Fit Questions
body: Always ask fit questions and clarify the next step without pressure.

heading: Pre-Drive Setup Script
body: Set expectations and confirm top 2 priorities in ~60 seconds.

heading: Values Bridge Sentence
body: Because you mentioned {need}, this {feature} helps give you {feeling}, especially when {moment}.
notes: Core template for the whole module.

heading: Peak Moment Setup
body: Do you want to feel what it’s like merging? Nothing aggressive—just enough to feel how smooth and confident it is.

heading: Quiet Guest Reset
body: That’s totally okay—this is a lot to take in. What’s going through your mind right now?
notes: Use when guest goes quiet mid-drive.

heading: Post-Drive Close
body: Based on {priority 1} and {priority 2}, how close did this feel to what you had in mind? What did you like most and what would you change?

heading: Role-Play Focus
body: Practice the full flow under pressure: setup, values bridge, micro-confirmations, quiet guest reset, post-drive fit close.

heading: Worksheet Purpose
body: Reinforce pre-drive setup, values bridge practice, micro-confirmations, and post-drive fit questions for consistent execution.
